location: Fugui 1st Road Lane 1, Beitou District, near Japanese School and American School
notes: Whole-floor 3BR/2BA residence on 5F of a 7-story elevator building at NT$66,000/month plus NT$3,000 management fee. Move-in ready with furniture, appliances, AC, two balconies, natural gas cooking, and flat parking available. The location near international schools is excellent for a foreign family. Two balconies warrant inspection of railing height/gaps for baby safety. Without photos it's unclear how modern the finishes are, but the unit is fully furnished and immediately available with a one-year minimum lease.
